title: Mashin Eiyuuden Wataru
alternative_title: Mashin Eiyuden Wataru, Spirit Hero Wataru, Keith Courage, Adrien le sauveur du monde, 魔神英雄伝ワタル
description: A 9-year-old boy named Wataru Ikusabe is magically transported to a magical realm of the gods called Soukaizan which he is supposed to save. In his quest to save the realm, he manages to transform a clay sculpture into a somewhat autonomous (small) Super Robot.
